sentences.en: By stopping smoking you are undoing most of the damage smoking has caused.
sentences.cn: 通过戒烟可以消除吸烟造成的大部分危害。

sentences.en: Half the undoing of the unsophisticated and natural mind is accomplished by forces wholly superhuman.
sentences.cn: 可以说,有一半涉世未深的纯洁心灵是被非人为的影响力带坏的.

sentences.en: He was not to know then that this was to prove his undoing.
sentences.cn: 当时他并不知道,这件事为他种下了祸根.

sentences.en: Her privileged position now proved her undoing.
sentences.cn: 她的优越正是她的祸患.

sentences.en: His lack of experience may prove to be his undoing.
sentences.cn: 他缺乏经验可能会最终导致他的失败。

sentences.en: It might mean undoing years of work.
sentences.cn: 这可能意味着多年的工作前功尽弃.

sentences.en: It was that comparison which was her undoing.
sentences.cn: 没想到这一比较给她播下了祸种.

sentences.en: She has invented a nifty little gadget for undoing stubborn nuts and bolts.
sentences.cn: 她发明了一种灵巧的小工具用来松开紧固的螺母和螺栓.

sentences.en: She may be the key to Triton's undoing.
sentences.cn: 她可能会成为消灭特莱顿的关键.

sentences.en: Stress can be the undoing of so many fine players.
sentences.cn: 紧张可能是这许多优秀选手失败的原因.

sentences.en: That one mistake was his undoing.
They would not succumb to this Titan who was bent on undoing them.
sentences.cn: 他们不愿向这个专门要损害他们的“巨人”让步.

sentences.en: This hard attitude may have led to his undoing.
sentences.cn: 可能就是这种强硬的态度导致了他的垮台.

sentences.en: This proved to be his undoing.
sentences.cn: 这种情况后来成了他垮台的原因.

sentences.en: This temptation to cover the distance between himself and the reader, to study his image in the sight of those who do not know him, can be his undoing: he has begun to write to please.
sentences.cn:
这种企图消除自己和读者之间距离的作法，企图用不了解自己的人的观点来研究自己塑造的形象的作法，会导致作家的毁灭，因为他已经开始为取悦他人而写作了。
???

words.tran_cn: 破灭的；未完成的；解开的

trans.tran_cn: 毁灭，取消，解开，毁灭或失败的原因
松开( undo的现在分词 )，解开，毁灭，败坏
